biography: R.J Hall was born on March 24, 1993 as Randy James Hall in Salt Lake City, Utah. His childhood was spent in his hometown of Kearns and graduated from Kearns High School in 2011. R.J started his career in filmmaking as young as 15 years old with featured background work. He started being represented by Rob Diamond Agency in 2013 with his debut, recurring role as Jimmy on the fan-based series, Invisible River. He has also acted in haunted walk-through attractions within Utah since 2009, known for his self-made character, Cynni.
name: R.J. Hall
